text: Burlingame () is a city in San Mateo County, California. It is located near San Francisco on the San Francisco Peninsula and has a significant shoreline on San Francisco Bay. As of the 2020 U.S. Census, Burlingame had a population of 31,386. == References == Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in San Mateo County, California Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area
title: Burlingame, California
